nl.weeaboo.vn.scene

Interface IImageDrawable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IColorizable, IDestructible, IDrawable, IDrawTransform, IInputHandler, IPositionable, ISignalHandler, ITransformable, IVisualElement, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IImageDrawable
extends ITransformable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRenderable getRenderer() 
      ITexture getTexture()
      If this image drawable uses a ITextureRenderer, returns the current texture of that renderer.
      void setRenderer(IRenderable r)
      Changes the renderer.
      void setRenderer(IRenderable r, Direction anchor)
      Changes the renderer, aligning the new renderer relative to the bounds of the previous renderer according to the anchor param.

      Changes the renderer and its relative alignment.

    • Method Detail

      • getRenderer

        IRenderable getRenderer()
        Returns:
        The renderer that this drawable uses to draw itself.

      • setRenderer

        void setRenderer(IRenderable r)
        Changes the renderer. Calls setRenderer(IRenderable, Direction) with an achor of Direction.TOP_LEFT.

      • setRenderer

        void setRenderer(IRenderable r,
                 Direction anchor)
        Changes the renderer, aligning the new renderer relative to the bounds of the previous renderer according to the anchor param.

      • setRenderer

        void setRenderer(IRenderable r,
                 double alignX,
                 double alignY)
        Changes the renderer and its relative alignment.
        See Also:
        setRenderer(IRenderable), ITransformable.setAlign(double, double)

      • getTexture

        @Nullable
ITexture getTexture()
        If this image drawable uses a ITextureRenderer, returns the current texture of that renderer. Otherwise, null is returned.
        See Also:
        ITextureRenderer.getTexture()

      • setTexture

        void setTexture(ITexture texture)
        Sets the renderer to a ITextureRenderer using the given texture

      • setTexture

        void setTexture(ITexture texture,
                int anchor)
        See Also:
        setTexture(ITexture, Direction)

      • setTexture

        void setTexture(ITexture texture,
                Direction anchor)
        See Also:
        setTexture(ITexture), setRenderer(IRenderable, Direction)

      • setTexture

        void setTexture(ITexture texture,
                double alignX,
                double alignY)
        See Also:
        setTexture(ITexture), setRenderer(IRenderable, double, double)
